channel.title: Tutorial: How to listen for transfers of an ERC-20 token
channel.description:
In this tutorial, we will cover how to create a MESG Service that listens for the transfers of an Ethereum ERC-20 token.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/listen-for-transfers-of-an-ethereum-erc20-token/
